channel.title: RuneX-Gaming Working on a 508. HELP NEEDED
channel.description:
RuneX is currently a great 317. But to improve the quality of game play, we have decided to start doing a 508.
Me myself, im a Website/Donations developer. So the server and client isnt actually my type of thing.
Therefore i have no idea how to set a 508 up. Its different to 317s and when i try guides, like usual, they fail.
I am hopeing that someone can help me out on this one :) It really means alot! Trust me. If your kind enough to help out then email modcallum@hotmail.com
Thanks, Teh nub Kid.
P.S - If this post is for some reason against the rules. Please remove and notify me of the error i made. (im new to mopar forums)
